answerText: three[10] This man's work on the three body problem lead to the start of chaos theory. He also names a map formed by taking the points where a system's trajectory repeatedly crosses a hyperplane in phase space.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 16 | 14 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: If a system has a cycle of this period, then by Sarkovskii's Theorem it has cycles of all periods. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this number that also names a case of the n-body problem to which Lagrangian points are solutions of a restricted circular form.
